application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the discharge of Condition 6 (Waste and Recycling Facilities) of planning permission ref: 23/00273/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to ensure satisfactory refuse facilities in accordance with policy SI17 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the discharge of Condition 7 (Cycle Parking) of planning permission ref: 23/00273/FUL. Therefore, the submitted details would fail to ensure that appropriate opportunities to promote sustainable transport are taken up, in accordance with policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the discharge of Condition 11 (Landscaping Scheme) of planning permission ref: 23/00273/FUL. Therefore, the proposal would fail to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required for Conditions 5 (Fire Safety Strategy), 6 (Waste and Recycling Facilities), 7 (Cycle Parking), 11 (Landscaping Scheme) and 12 (Drainage) of planning permission 23/00273/FUL (Variation of Condition Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with condition1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission 21/04113/FUL (Erection of two storey detached dwelling house and associated parking) to allow amendment to the roof and addition of a dormer window and rooflight.)
